data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Hai-Jian, Shi, Fu-Ming (2016): One new species of the genus Nigrimacula Shi, Bian & Zhou, 2016 (Orthoptera: Meconematinae) from Sichuan, China. Zootaxa 4132 (4): 591-593, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4132.4.11
